channel.description: Recent content in hesitation on Khaled Allen

item.title: The Hard Way to Do Anything Right
item.description: What a discouraging headline for a blog post, right? Stick with me though, I promise you'll have something interesting to think about. When I was transforming my fitness and my body, I had absolutely no clue what I was doing. I cringe remembering all the things I did wrong and all the ways I could have hurt myself. But I also remember how determined I was. I was willing to do anything and everything necessary to accomplish my goals.
